metadata.name: Suspicious MSExchangeMailboxReplication ASPX Write
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious activity in which the MSExchangeMailboxReplication process writes .asp and .apsx files to disk, which could be a sign of ProxyShell exploitation

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\msexchangemailboxreplication.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.aspx')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.asp'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious activity in which the MSExchangeMailboxReplication process writes .asp and .apsx files to disk, which could be a sign of ProxyShell exploitation
